comments.text:
Beltzner mentioned during the triage meeting a few minutes ago that it would be nice if it were easy to tell that a crash happened during shutdown.

Maybe we should have a flag that we put into crash report metadata (perhaps around the same time we tell sessionstore that we're shutting down?).
comments.creator: dbaron@dbaron.org
